title: Wrong allotments?
body: Hi, we just identified that some of the allotments checked between 20th March 2024 and 30th of March 2024 for the IPOs of Krystal Integrated Services Limited, Popular Vehicles and Services Limited, Pratham EPC Projects Limited, Gopal Snacks Limited and V R Infraspace Limited were inadvertently displayed as Not Applied. We've now resolved this issue. I'd like to urge you to please contact me at lakshaymittal225@gmail.com (you can find this address on playstore/appstore) whenever you find any discrepancies as this would help me resolve the issue faster. Thanks!
